title: Between the Scenes - Making Sense of Jussie Smollett's Alleged Attack
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Making Sense of Jussie Smollett's Alleged Attack
description:
Trevor weighs in on actor Jussie Smollett's unraveling hate crime claims and discusses people's tendency to embrace stories that confirm their political biases.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
